Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Can ask specific questions with AI when I need to, not only in a 2 hour window in a full classroom or waiting for responses online through forums.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Sometimes I feel like AI is more productive feedback, whereas teacher feedback seems personal.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: You can always ask AI to explain feedback (i.e. can you go into more detail about this), compared to your teacher on assignments most of the time it is a long process to get extra feedback on your assignments and even in the planning stages you're not supposed to get direct feedback.
